description: The Centre and states are working to ensure there is a lower GST burden on telecom and financial services, a move that will keep a check on insurance and phone bills, even as states pitch for concessions for products such as ‘puja samagri’ and textiles.
title: Lower GST rate for insurance, telecom likely - Times of India

author: Melissa Davey
description: Public patients wait 42 days for elective surgery compared with 20 days for patients who use private health insurance
title: Private patients treated faster in public hospitals than public patients, data show

author: John Fitzsimons
description: Bending the truth might mean a smaller insurance premium, but it could leave you severely worse off
title: The little white lies that can kill your cover

author: Josh Dawsey
description: Many advisers oppose the move because they worry it will backfire politically if people lose their insurance or see huge premium spikes.
title: Trump said to favor move that could destabilize Obamacare

author: Dan Levine, Lawrence Hurley and Yasmeen Abutaleb
description: More than a dozen Democratic attorneys general on Thursday sought to intervene to defend a key part of the Obamacare healthcare law - subsidy payments to insurance companies - which is under threat in a court case.
title: Democratic attorneys general seek to intervene in Obamacare case

author: Michelle Cortez
description: The number of Americans whose cancers were diagnosed at the earliest stage, when it’s most likely to be cured, increased after Obamacare went into effect and more citizens had access to health insurance, a new study found.
title: Obamacare Helped Americans Detect Cancer Earlier

author: Bob Bryan
description: Trump reportedly told White House aides he wanted to end cost-sharing-reduction payments, which experts say would wreck Obamacare's insurance exchanges.
title: Trump reportedly wants to make a move that experts say could make Obamacare 'explode'

author: RICARDO ALONSO-ZALDIVAR
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Another year of big premium increases and dwindling choice is looking like a distinct possibility for many consumers who buy their own health insurance — but why, and who's to blame? President Donald Trump has seized on early market rumbles as validation of his claim that "Obamacare" is a disaster, collapsing of its own weight. Democrats, meanwhile, accuse Trump of "sabotage" on a program he's dissed and wants to dismantle. It's more complicated, say some independent experts. Trump inherited some problems and risks making things worse.
title: Around round of premium hikes brewing: blame Trump or Obama?
